PAGE_TITLE: axis | The financial hub for your business.
PAGE_DESCRIPTION: axis for Business enables small businesses to seamlessly manage employee payroll, salary advances, and expenses - all from one place.
START_TODAY_MODAL_TITLE: Get started with axis for Business
START_TODAY_MODAL_PARAGRAPH: Join other small businesses to seamlessly manage employee payroll, salary advances, and expenses - from one place.
START_TODAY_MODAL_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
START_TODAY_SUCCESS_MODAL_PARAGRAPH: Thank you for leaving us your details. We will be in touch soon.
SECTION_1_HEADING: The financial hub for your small business
SECTION_1_PARAGRAPH: Licensed by the Central Bank of Egypt
SECTION_2_HEADING: Send salaries & pay contractors instantly on a mobile wallet
SECTION_2_PARAGRAPH: Send your employees their salaries & pay contractors instantly on an axis wallet - at any time, even in the middle of the night, on a weekend, or bank holiday
SECTION_3_HEADING: Give salary advances without the hassle of managing them
SECTION_3_PARAGRAPH: Give employees early access to their earned salary without having to worry about fronting the money! axis does that
SECTION_4_PARAGRAPH: All your employees need to do is upload a picture of their receipts onto the axis app to get reimbursed instantly on their axis wallet once it’s approved.
SECTION_5_HEADING: A mobile wallet for your employees to send, spend, and get cashback
SECTION_5_PARAGRAPH: Enable your employees to send money to anyone with a mobile wallet in Egypt & get rewarded with points and cashback when they pay their bills, pay by QR code, or buy anything online with a virtual Visa card.
SECTION_6_PARAGRAPH_1: axis is regulated by the Central Bank of Egypt and we use secure processes to protect your information and to prevent unauthorized use. Your entire money in the agent wallet is secured.
SECTION_6_PARAGRAPH_2--commentted: We have partnerships with Mashreq Bank & Visa and are certified by Meeza Digital to deliver you the most secure service.
SECTION_6_PARAGRAPH_2: We have a partnership with Visa and are certified by Meeza Digital to deliver you the most secure service.
SECTION_7_CARD_1_PARAGRAPH: Get a dedicated account manager to help you get started on the same day.
SECTION_7_CARD_2_HEADING: Say goodbye to hidden fees forever
SECTION_7_CARD_2_PARAGRAPH: We don’t believe in set-up fee, admin fees, or fine print.
SECTION_7_CARD_3_PARAGRAPH: If you need help, our agents are available 24/7 by phone on <0>{businessSupportHotline}</0>, in-app chat, and email at <1>{businessSupportEmail}</1>.
